entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
